projects.title: SwapEase
projects.description: A clothing swap app powered by an AI Stylist that can recommend you clothing styles from nearby clothes. We develop this app to fight fast fashion digitally and alleviate problems students face when trying to swap clothes: difficulty in finding clothes and other people nearby to swap clothes with.

projects.title: Serena: Smart Home, Smart Wellbeing
projects.description: A smart diffuser that utilizes IoT and an emotion detector AI that can detect the users emotions through the device's camera and diffuse the appropiate essential oils to help adjust the users mood automatically.

projects.title: Skill Up 2023 Website
projects.description: I led my team to redesign and implemented new features to the company's website such as SHAPE B2 registration to help students register to Skill Up's apprenticeship program, #EducationForAll page as part of collaboration with TimorBelajar to help users donate to their cause, and Skill Up's admin panel to help our admins manage data.

projects.title: Collegacy Indonesia 2023 Website
projects.description: I market Collegacy Indonesia's company profile and upcoming webinar registrations by designing and developing the company's website

projects.title: I Can Do It
projects.description: I developed an educational website to help children learn about basic life skills interactively through audio-visual articles and quizzes.

projects.title: VIXUN Music Finder
projects.description: My first fullstack website that helps users find music by scrapping through Spotify & Deezer API and augment data from my custom-made Amazon Music scrapper.
